channel.title: Scientist crossbow bug
channel.description: The scientist in Apprehension, just before the freezer part can be shot from a distance (not entering the chamber) with a crossbow and not die from no more than 8 arrows. Check out his fresh new hairstyle [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DeW74eKyvOA[/url] [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=100748260[/url] [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=100748278[/url] [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=100748269[/url]
